players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "I am not the one who killed Alice. I believe we should focus on finding the real culprit and work together as a team to ensure the safety of our village."

Diana: "I have an alibi for the night of Alice's death. I was seen by several villagers in the tavern, drinking and socializing until late into the night. Let us not jump to conclusions and instead focus on finding evidence that can lead us to the real killer."
You: "I don't believe Diana's alibi, and I think we should investigate further to see if anyone else saw her that night. We can't just take their word for it."
Charlie: "Let's not focus on Diana's alibi just yet, let's look at the bigger picture and see if we can find any other clues that might help us figure out who killed Alice."

Votes: Bob voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
